051
052public class EObjectLoader extends DispatchingLoader {
053        
054        /**
055         * If proxy URI is prefixed with ./ then the URI is not resolved relative to the context resource at the load time.
056         * Rather the prefix is removed and a URI created from the tail is passed to the proxy object to be used
057         * at proxy resolution time. 
058         */
059        public static final String LATE_PROXY_RESOLUTION_URI_PREFIX = "./";     
060        
061        static final String HREF_KEY = "href";
062
063        /**
064         * Use this annotation to customize load keys. Use feature-key annotation for features to also customize containment path calculation.
065         */
066        public static final String LOAD_KEY = "load-key";
067        
068        /**
069         * Information about how element is loaded in markdown. For {@link EStructuralFeature}s overrides feature documentation if present.  
070         */
071        public static final String LOAD_DOC = "load-doc";
072        
073        /**
074         * Reference to a resource with information about how element is loaded in markdown. For {@link EStructuralFeature}s overrides feature documentation if present.  
075         */
076        public static final String LOAD_DOC_REF = "load-doc-reference";
077        
078        /**
079         * If this Nasdanika annotation details is set to "true" on a {@link EStructuralFeature} and configuration object is not a map
080         * then the configuration object is loaded into this feature. 
081         */
082        public static final String IS_DEFAULT_FEATURE = "default-feature";
083        
084        /**
085         * {@link EReference} annotation with a name of value feature as a value. 
086         * Value feature is loaded with the configuration map value for reference with eKeys. 
087         * If this annotation is not set then the object itself is loaded with the value. 
088         */
089        public static final String VALUE_FEATURE = "value-feature";
090        
091        /**
092         * If this Nasdanika annotation details is set to "true" on a {@link EAttribute} and configuration object is a {@link String}
093         * then the configuration object is resolved relative to the model resource {@link URI} (base). 
094         */
095        public static final String IS_RESOLVE_URI = "resolve-uri";
096        
097        /**
098         * This annotation allows to override element types for homogenous references.
099         * The value shall be a YAML map of reference names to types. If entry value is a string it is treated as a class name from the same
100         * {@link EPackage} as the annotated {@link EClass}. If it is a map then it shall contain <code>ns-uri</code> and <code>name</code> keys.
101         * EClass is looked up in the loader's {@link ResourceSet} package registry.
102         */
103        public static final String REFERENCE_TYPES = "reference-types";
104        
105        /**
106         * This annotation allows to customize element types for homogenous references based on configuration element type
107         * The value shall be a YAML map of configuration types (string, map, list, number, boolean) to reference types. 
108         * If entry value is a string it is treated as a class name from the same
109         * {@link EPackage} as the annotated {@link EReference}'s {@link EClass}. 
110         * If it is a map then it shall contain <code>ns-uri</code> and <code>name</code> keys.
111         * EClass is looked up in the loader's {@link ResourceSet} package registry.
112         */
113        public static final String REFERENCE_TYPE = "reference-type";
114        
115        /**
116         * This annotation allows to load keys for features.
117         * The value shall be a YAML map of feature names to keys. If entry value is a string it is treated as a key name.
118         */
119        public static final String LOAD_KEYS = "load-keys";
120        
121        private ThreadLocal<java.util.function.Function<EClass, EObject>> threadConstructor = new ThreadLocal<java.util.function.Function<EClass,EObject>>();
122        
123        /**
124         * Sets thread constructor for creation of 
125         * @param constructor
126         */
127        public void setThreadConstructor(java.util.function.Function<EClass, EObject> constructor) {
128                threadConstructor.set(constructor);
129        }
130        
131        /**
132         * 
133         * @param eClass
134         * @param feature
135         * @return Features in the argument class the argument feature is exclusive with.
136         */
137        public static Object[] getExclusiveWith(EClass eClass, EStructuralFeature feature, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider) {
138                Set<String> ret = new HashSet<>();
139                for (EStructuralFeature sf: eClass.getEAllStructuralFeatures()) {
140                        String exclusiveWithStr = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(sf, "exclusive-with"); // A space-separated list of load keys which are mutually exclusive with the annotated feature.
141                        if (!Util.isBlank(exclusiveWithStr)) {
142                                for (String ew: exclusiveWithStr.split("\\s")) {
143                                        if (sf == feature) {
144                                                ret.add(ew);
145                                        } else if (ew.equals(keyProvider.apply(eClass, feature))) {
146                                                ret.add(keyProvider.apply(eClass, sf));
147                                        }
148                                        
149                                }
150                        }
151                }
152
153                return ret.toArray();
154        }
155        
156        /**
157         * If true, feature is loaded even if it not changeable, but it is not injected into the object.
158         * In this case the getter can access loaded value using {@link LoadTracker} adapter get() method.
159         */
160        public static final String IS_COMPUTED = "computed";
161        
162        public static boolean isDefaultFeature(EClass eClass, EStructuralFeature feature) {
163                if ("true".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(feature, IS_DEFAULT_FEATURE))) {
164                        return true;
165                }
166                String dfName = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eClass, IS_DEFAULT_FEATURE);
167                if (!Util.isBlank(dfName)) {
168                        return feature.getName().equals(dfName);
169                }
170                for (EClass st: eClass.getEAllSuperTypes()) {
171                        dfName = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(st, IS_DEFAULT_FEATURE);
172                        if (!Util.isBlank(dfName)) {
173                                return feature.getName().equals(dfName);
174                        }                       
175                }
176                return false;
177        }
178        
179        public static String getValueFeature(EReference eReference) {
180                return NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eReference, VALUE_FEATURE);
181        }       
182        
183        /**
184         * If this Nasdanika annotation details is set to "false" on a {@link EStructuralFeature} or {@link EClass} then this feature or class is not loaded from configuration. 
185         */
186        public static final String IS_LOADABLE = "loadable";
187        
188        /**
189         * If this Nasdanika annotation details is set to "true" on a {@link EReference} with a concrete element type then reference element(s) are loaded using the reference type
190         * and they shall be a maps of features as opposed of a map of type to a map of features.
191         */
192        public static final String IS_HOMOGENOUS = "homogenous";
193        
194        /**
195         * If this Nasdanika annotation details is set to "true" on a homogenous {@link EReference} then string values are treated as default features, not as object references. 
196         */
197        public static final String IS_STRICT_CONTAINMENT = "strict-containment";
198        
199        /**
200         * Default implementation of load key provider - gets load key from the Nasdanika annotation (urn:org.nasdanika) <code>load-key</code> details if it is present.
201         * For features delegates to {@link NcoreUtil} getFeatureKey.
202         * Otherwise converts {@link ENamedElement} element name from camel case to lower-cased kebab case. E.g. firstName is converted first-name.
203         */
204        public static final BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> LOAD_KEY_PROVIDER = (eClass,ne) -> {
205                EAnnotation na = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotation(ne);
206                if (na != null) {
207                        if (na.getDetails().containsKey(IS_LOADABLE) && "false".equals(na.getDetails().get(IS_LOADABLE))) {
208                                return null;
209                        }
210                        if (na.getDetails().containsKey(LOAD_KEY)) {
211                                return na.getDetails().get(LOAD_KEY);
212                        }
213                }
214
215                if (eClass != null && ne instanceof EStructuralFeature) {
216                        EStructuralFeature feature = (EStructuralFeature) ne;
217                        String loadKey = getLoadKey(eClass, feature);           
218                        return loadKey == null ? NcoreUtil.getFeatureKey(eClass, feature) : loadKey;
219                }
220                
221                return Util.camelToKebab(ne.getName());
222        };
223        
224        private BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider;
225        
226        private class EPackageEntry {
227
228                EPackage ePackage;
229                
230                BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider;
231                                
232                EPackageEntry(EPackage ePackage, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider) {
233                        this.ePackage = ePackage;
234                        this.keyProvider = keyProvider == null ? LOAD_KEY_PROVIDER : keyProvider;
235                }
236                
237        }
238        
239        private java.util.function.Supplier<Collection<Map.Entry<String,EPackageEntry>>> registrySupplier = () -> Collections.emptySet();
240        
241        private Collection<Map.Entry<String,EPackageEntry>> getRegistry() {
242                return registrySupplier.get();
243        }
244
245        private ResourceSet resourceSet;
246
247        public EObjectLoader(ObjectLoader chain, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider, EPackage... ePackages) {
248                super(chain);
249                this.keyProvider = keyProvider == null ? LOAD_KEY_PROVIDER : keyProvider;
250                if (ePackages.length > 0) {
251                        Map<String,EPackageEntry> registry = new LinkedHashMap<>();
252                        for (EPackage ePackage: ePackages) {
253                                Entry<String, EPackageEntry> re = createRegistryEntry(ePackage);
254                                if (re != null) {
255                                        registry.put(re.getKey(), re.getValue());
256                                }
257                        }
258                        registrySupplier = registry::entrySet;
259                }
260        }
261        
262        public MarkerFactory getMarkerFactory() {
263                return markerFactory;
264        }
265        
266        public void setMarkerFactory(MarkerFactory markerFactory) {
267                this.markerFactory = markerFactory;
268        }
269        
270        private MarkerFactory markerFactory = MarkerFactory.INSTANCE;
271        
272        public EObjectLoader(EPackage... ePackages) {
273                this(null, null, ePackages);
274        }
275
276        public EObjectLoader(ObjectLoader chain, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider, ResourceSet resourceSet) {
277                this(chain, keyProvider);
278                this.resourceSet = resourceSet;
279                
280                if (resourceSet != null) {
281                        registrySupplier = () -> resourceSet.getPackageRegistry().values().stream().map(EPackage.class::cast).map(this::createRegistryEntry).collect(Collectors.toList());
282                }               
283        }
284        
285        public EObjectLoader(ResourceSet resourceSet) {
286                this(null, null, resourceSet);
287        }
288        
289        private Map.Entry<String, EPackageEntry> createRegistryEntry(EPackage ePackage, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider) {
290                if (keyProvider == null) {
291                        keyProvider = this.keyProvider;
292                }
293                String packageKey = keyProvider.apply(null, ePackage);
294                if (Util.isBlank(packageKey)) {
295                        return null;
296                }
297                return Map.entry(packageKey + "-", new EPackageEntry(ePackage, keyProvider == null ? this.keyProvider : keyProvider));
298        }
299        
300        private Map.Entry<String, EPackageEntry> createRegistryEntry(EPackage ePackage) {
301                return createRegistryEntry(ePackage, null);
302        }
303
304        /**
305         * Creates a new EObject from a prototype. 
306         * @param loader
307         * @param type
308         * @param config
309         * @param prototype Prototype EObject, can be null.
310         * @param base
311         * @param progressMonitor
312         * @param marker
313         * @return
314         */
315        public Object create(ObjectLoader loader, String type, Object config, java.util.function.Function<EClass, EObject> constructor, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
316                BiSupplier<EClass,BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String>> result = resolveEClass(type);
317                if (result != null) {
318                        return create(loader, result.getFirst(), config, base, progressMonitor, markers, result.getSecond(), constructor);
319                }
320                
321                return super.create(loader, type, config, base, progressMonitor, markers);
322        }
323        
324        /**
325         * Creates an object by calling create() which takes constructor and passing thread constructor to it.
326         */
327        @Override
328        public Object create(ObjectLoader loader, String type, Object config, URI base, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, List<? extends Marker> markers) {
329                return create(loader, type, config, threadConstructor.get(), base, progressMonitor, markers);
330        }       
331        
332        /**
333         * Resolves EClass and key provider from type name.
334         * @param type
335         * @return
336         */
337        public BiSupplier<EClass,BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String>> resolveEClass(String type) {          
338                for (Entry<String, EPackageEntry> re: getRegistry()) {
339                        EPackageEntry ePackageEntry = re.getValue();
340                        if (type.startsWith(re.getKey())) {
341                                for (EClassifier eClassifier: ePackageEntry.ePackage.getEClassifiers()) {
342                                        if (eClassifier instanceof EClass && "true".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eClassifier, IS_LOADABLE, "true"))) {
343                                                String eClassifierKey = ePackageEntry.keyProvider.apply(null, eClassifier);
344                                                if (eClassifierKey != null && type.equals(re.getKey() + eClassifierKey)) {
345                                                        return resolveResult(ePackageEntry, eClassifier); 
346                                                }
347                                        }
348                                }
349                        } else {
350                                String exportsAnnotation = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ePackageEntry.ePackage, "exports");
351                                if (!Util.isBlank(exportsAnnotation)) {
352                                        Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
353                                        Map<String,Object> exportsMap = yaml.load(exportsAnnotation);
354                                        for (Entry<String, Object> eme: exportsMap.entrySet()) {
355                                                EClassifier eClassifier = ePackageEntry.ePackage.getEClassifier(eme.getKey());
356                                                if (eClassifier instanceof EClass && "true".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eClassifier, IS_LOADABLE, "true"))) {
357                                                        Object val = eme.getValue();
358                                                        if (val instanceof Collection) {
359                                                                for (Object vale: (Collection<?>) val) {
360                                                                        if (type.equals(vale)) {
361                                                                                return resolveResult(ePackageEntry, eClassifier);
362                                                                        }
363                                                                }
364                                                        } else if (type.equals(val)) {
365                                                                return resolveResult(ePackageEntry, eClassifier);                                                               
366                                                        }
367                                                }
368                                        }
369                                }
370                        }
371                }
372                return null;            
373        }
374
375        private BiSupplier<EClass, BiFunction<EClass, ENamedElement, String>> resolveResult(EPackageEntry ePackageEntry,
376                        EClassifier eClassifier) {
377                return new BiSupplier<EClass, BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String>>() {
378
379                        @Override
380                        public EClass getFirst() {
381                                return (EClass) eClassifier;
382                        }
383
384                        @Override
385                        public BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement, String> getSecond() {
386                                return ePackageEntry.keyProvider;
387                        }
388                };
389        }
390        
391        /**
392         * Creates an instance of EClass or a supplier factory
393         * @param loader
394         * @param eClass
395         * @param config
396         * @param base
397         * @param progressMonitor
398         * @param marker
399         * @param ePackageEntry
400         * @param eClassifier
401         * @return
402         */
403        public Object create(
404                        ObjectLoader loader, 
405                        EClass eClass, 
406                        Object config, 
407                        URI base, 
408                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor, 
409                        List<? extends Marker> markers, 
410                        BiFunction<EClass,ENamedElement,String> keyProvider,
411                        java.util.function.Function<EClass, EObject> constructor) {
412                
413                // Nulls are nulls
414                if (config == null) {
415                        return null;
416                }
417                
418                // Proxy
419                Object proxy = createProxy(eClass, config, base, markers, progressMonitor);
420                if (proxy != null) {
421                        return configure(proxy, loader, config, base, null, progressMonitor);
422                }
423                
424                Class<?> instanceClass = eClass.getInstanceClass();
425                EFactory factory = eClass.getEPackage().getEFactoryInstance();
426                
427                if (Loadable.class.isAssignableFrom(instanceClass)) {
428                        EObject eObject = factory.create(eClass);
429                        ((Loadable) eObject).load(loader, config, base, progressMonitor, markers);
430                        return configure(eObject, loader, config, base, null, progressMonitor);
431                }
432                if (ContextLoadable.class.isAssignableFrom(instanceClass)) {
433                        return new SupplierFactory<EObject>() {
434
435                                @Override
436                                public Supplier<EObject> create(Context context) {
437                                        return new Supplier<EObject>() {
438
439                                                @Override
440                                                public double size() {
441                                                        return 1;
442                                                }
443
444                                                @Override
445                                                public String name() {
446                                                        return "Creating " + eClass.getName();
447                                                }
448
449                                                @Override
450                                                public EObject execute(ProgressMonitor pm) {
451                                                        EObject eObject = factory.create(eClass);
452                                                        ((ContextLoadable) eObject).load(context, loader, config, base, pm, markers);
453                                                        return configure(eObject, loader, config, base, context, pm);
454                                                }
455                                                
456                                        };
457                                }                                                                       
458                        };
459                }                                                       
460                EObjectSupplierFactory eObjectSupplierFactory = createEObjectSupplierFactory(eClass, keyProvider, constructor);
461                eObjectSupplierFactory.load(loader, config, base, progressMonitor, markers);
462                FunctionFactory<EObject, EObject> configureFactory = ctx -> new org.nasdanika.common.Function<EObject, EObject>() {
463
464                        @Override
465                        public double size() {
466                                return 1;
467                        }
468
469                        @Override
470                        public String name() {
471                                return "Configure";
472                        }
473
474                        @Override
475                        public EObject execute(EObject eObject, ProgressMonitor pm) {
476                                return configure(eObject, loader, config, base, ctx, pm);
477                        }
478                        
479                };
480                return eObjectSupplierFactory.then(configureFactory);
481        }
482        
483        /**
484         * Override to configure an object after creation. This method can replace the object.
485         * @param obj Created object to configure.
486         * @param loader Root loader.
487         * @param config Object config.
488         * @param base Base URI.
489         * @param context Context. Not null if created by a supplier.
490         * @param progressMonitor Progress monitor.
491         * @return Configured object. This implementation loads linked resources.
492         */
493        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
494        protected <T> T configure(
495                        T obj,
496                        ObjectLoader loader, 
497                        Object config, 
498                        URI base, 
499                        Context context,
500                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
501                
502                // Loading linked resources if resourceSet is not null.
503                if (resourceSet != null) {
504                        if (obj instanceof EObject) {
505                                EObject eObj = (EObject) obj;
506                                EClass eClass = eObj.eClass();
507                                for (EAttribute eAttr: eClass.getEAllAttributes()) {
508                                        if (isLinkedResourceAttribute(eAttr)) {
509                                                linkResources(eObj, eObj, eAttr, loader, config, base, context, progressMonitor);
510                                        }
511                                }
512                                
513                                // EMaps with EString value attributes annotated with content-type = resource-uri.
514                                for (EReference eRef: eClass.getEAllReferences()) {
515                                        EClassifier refType = eRef.getEType();
516                                        Class<?> refClass = refType.getInstanceClass();
517                                        if (eRef.isMany() && refType instanceof EClass && refClass != null && Map.Entry.class.isAssignableFrom(refClass)) {
518                                                EStructuralFeature valueFeature = ((EClass) refType).getEStructuralFeature("value");
519                                                if (valueFeature instanceof EAttribute && isLinkedResourceAttribute((EAttribute) valueFeature)) {
520                                                        for (EObject entry: (Collection<EObject>) eObj.eGet(eRef)) {
521                                                                linkResources(eObj, entry, (EAttribute) valueFeature, loader, config, base, context, progressMonitor);                                                  
522                                                        }
523                                                }
524                                        }
525                                }
526                        }
527                }
528                
529                return obj;
530        }
531        
532        protected boolean isLinkedResourceAttribute(EAttribute eAttribute) {
533                return eAttribute != null && eAttribute.getEType() == EcorePackage.Literals.ESTRING && "resource-uri".equals(NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(eAttribute, "content-type")); 
534        }
535        
536        /**
537         * Loads and links resources specified in the valueObject's linkedResourceAttribute to the semanticElement.
538         * @param semanticElement Loaded object to link the resource to.
539         * @param valueObject Value object containing linked resource attribute, can be different from the semanticElement in case of EMap's.
540         * @param linkedResourceAttribute Attribute containing resource URI.
541         * @param loader 
542         * @param config
543         * @param base
544         * @param context
545         * @param progressMonitor
546         */
547        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
548        protected void linkResources(
549                        EObject semanticElement, 
550                        EObject valueObject, 
551                        EAttribute linkedResourceAttribute,
552                        ObjectLoader loader, 
553                        Object config, 
554                        URI base, 
555                        Context context,
556                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
557                
558                if (linkedResourceAttribute.isMany()) {
559                        ListIterator<String> it = ((List<String>) valueObject.eGet(linkedResourceAttribute)).listIterator();
560                        while (it.hasNext()) {
561                                it.set(linkResource(semanticElement, it.next(), loader, config, base, context, progressMonitor));
562                        }
563                } else {
564                        valueObject.eSet(linkedResourceAttribute, linkResource(semanticElement, (String) valueObject.eGet(linkedResourceAttribute), loader, config, base, context, progressMonitor));
565                }               
566        }
567        
568        /**
569         * Loads and links resources specified in the valueObject's linkedResourceAttribute to the semanticElement.
570         * @param semanticElement Loaded object to link the resource to.
571         * @param resourceUriStr
572         * @param loader
573         * @param config
574         * @param base
575         * @param context
576         * @param progressMonitor
577         * @return
578         */
579        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
580        protected String linkResource(
581                        EObject semanticElement,
582                        String resourceUriStr,
583                        ObjectLoader loader, 
584                        Object config, 
585                        URI base, 
586                        Context context,
587                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
588                
589                URI resourceURI = URI.createURI(resourceUriStr);
590                if (resourceURI.isRelative() && base != null && !base.isRelative() && base.isHierarchical()) {
591                        resourceURI = resourceURI.resolve(base);
592                }
593                Resource linkedResource = resourceSet.getResource(resourceURI, true);
594                
595                // Adding to linked resources adapter for setting children in createSemanticElement                             
596                LinkedResourcesAdapter linkedResourcesAdapter = (LinkedResourcesAdapter) EcoreUtil.getRegisteredAdapter(semanticElement, LinkedResourcesAdapter.class);
597                if (linkedResourcesAdapter == null) {
598                        linkedResourcesAdapter = new LinkedResourcesAdapter();
599                        semanticElement.eAdapters().add(linkedResourcesAdapter);
600                }
601                linkedResourcesAdapter.getLinkedResources().add(linkedResource);
602                
603                if (linkedResource instanceof AbstractEObjectFactoryProcessorResource) {
604                        ((AbstractEObjectFactoryProcessorResource<EObject>) linkedResource).setParent(semanticElement);
605                }
606                
607                return encodeLinkedResource(semanticElement, resourceUriStr, linkedResource, loader, config, base, context, progressMonitor);
608        }
609        
610        /**
611         * Optionally changes the value of the resourceUriStr by encoding the resource.
612         * This implementation replaces resourceUriStr value with encoded Drawio document so it can be used to generate interactive diagrams in documentation. 
613         * @param semanticElement Loaded object to link the resource to.
614         * @param resourceUriStr
615         * @param linkedResource
616         * @param loader
617         * @param config
618         * @param base
619         * @param context
620         * @param progressMonitor
621         * @return
622         */
623        protected String encodeLinkedResource(
624                        EObject semanticElement,
625                        String resourceUriStr,
626                        Resource linkedResource,
627                        ObjectLoader loader, 
628                        Object config, 
629                        URI base, 
630                        Context context,
631                        ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
632                
633                if (linkedResource instanceof URIEncodable) {
634                        return ((URIEncodable) linkedResource).encode().toString();
635                }
636                
637                return resourceUriStr;  
638        }
639                
640        /**
641         * Creates a new {@link EObjectSupplierFactory}. This implementation calls EObjectSupplierFactory constructor.
642         * @param eClass
643         * @param keyProvider
644         * @return
645         */
646        protected EObjectSupplierFactory createEObjectSupplierFactory(
647                        EClass eClass,
648                        BiFunction<EClass, ENamedElement, String> keyProvider,
649                        java.util.function.Function<EClass, EObject> constructor) {             
650                return new EObjectSupplierFactory(this, eClass, keyProvider, constructor);
651        }
652
653        /**
654         * Creates a proxy object if config is a singleton map with "href" key.
655         * @param eClass
656         * @param config
657         * @param base
658         * @return Proxy object or null if config is not a proxy config.
659         */
660        public EObject createProxy(EClass eClass, Object config, URI base, List<? extends Marker> markers, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
661                if (config instanceof Map) {
662                        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
663                        Map<Object,Object> configMap = (Map<Object,Object>) config;
664                        if (configMap.size() == 1 
665                                        && configMap.containsKey(HREF_KEY)) {
666                                EObject eObject = eClass.getEPackage().getEFactoryInstance().create(eClass);
667                                if (eObject instanceof MinimalEObjectImpl) {
668                                        Object href = configMap.get(HREF_KEY);                                  
669                                        URI proxyURI;
670                                        if (href instanceof URI) {
671                                                proxyURI = (URI) href;
672                                        } else if (href instanceof String) {
673                                                proxyURI = URI.createURI((String) configMap.get(HREF_KEY));
674                                        } else {
675                                                return null;
676                                        }
677                                        
678                                        String proxyURIStr = proxyURI.toString();
679                                        if (proxyURIStr.startsWith(LATE_PROXY_RESOLUTION_URI_PREFIX)) {
680                                                proxyURI = URI.createURI(proxyURIStr.substring(LATE_PROXY_RESOLUTION_URI_PREFIX.length()));
681                                        } else if (base != null) {
682                                                proxyURI = proxyURI.resolve(base);
683                                        }
684                                        ((MinimalEObjectImpl) eObject).eSetProxyURI(proxyURI);
685                                        mark(eObject, markers, progressMonitor);
686                                        
687                                        return eObject;
688                                }
689                        }
690                }
691                return null;
692        }
693
694        /**
695         * If marker is not null adds marked adapter. If eObject is instance of {@link Marked} creates and sets {@link org.nasdanika.ncore.Marker}.
696         * @param eObject
697         * @param marker
698         */
699        public void mark(EObject eObject, List<? extends Marker> markers, ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
700                if (markers != null) {
701                        eObject.eAdapters().add(new MarkedAdapter(markers));
702                        if (eObject instanceof Marked) {                
703                                for (Marker marker: markers) {
704                                        org.nasdanika.ncore.Marker mMarker = markerFactory.createMarker(marker.getLocation(), progressMonitor);
705                                        mMarker.setPosition(marker.getPosition());
706                                        ((Marked) eObject).getMarkers().add(0, mMarker);
707                                }
708                        }
709                }
710        }
711        
712        /**
713         * Resolves proxy using the loader's resource set.
714         * Does not suppress exceptions. 
715         */
716        public EObject resolve(EObject proxy) {
717                if (!proxy.eIsProxy()) {
718                        return proxy;
719                }
720
721                URI proxyURI = ((InternalEObject) proxy).eProxyURI();
722                EObject ret = resourceSet.getEObject(proxyURI, true);
723                return ret == null || ret == proxy ? ret : resolve(ret);
724        }       
725
726        public ResourceSet getResourceSet() {
727                return resourceSet;
728        }
729        
730        /**
731         * @return Load key from <code>load-keys</code> annotation. 
732         */
733        public static String getLoadKey(EClass eClass, EStructuralFeature feature) {
734                for (EClass ec: NcoreUtil.lineage(eClass)) {
735                        String loadKeys = NcoreUtil.getNasdanikaAnnotationDetail(ec, LOAD_KEYS);
736                        if (!Util.isBlank(loadKeys)) {
737                                Yaml yaml = new Yaml();
738                                Map<String,Object> loadKeyMap = yaml.load(loadKeys);
739                                Object loadKey = loadKeyMap.get(feature.getName());
740                                if (loadKey instanceof String) {
741                                        return (String) loadKey;
742                                }
743                        }
744                }
745                return null;
746        }
747        
748}
